course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Academic Support for BIOG 1445 Introduction to Comparative Physiology

notes.note: Enrollment limited to: members of the Biology Scholars Program.

Biological Science majors are required to take this course for a letter grade. Students enroll through the lecture then choose their discussion section. 1st Day of lecture this course will change to instructor consent and require a permission code to enroll.

course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Introduction to Comparative Physiology, Individualized Instruction

notes.note: Course will change to instructor consent and require a permission code to enroll on Thursday, August 27. No admittance after first week.

course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Introduction to Comparative Physiology, Individualized Instruction

notes.note: Alternate section for those with T 9:05-9:55am class conflict. Contact course at biog1445@cornell.edu for consent to enroll. No admittance after first week.
Biological Sciences majors are required to take this course for a letter grade.

Enrollment limited to: members of the biology scholars program.

course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Introduction to Research Methods in Biology

notes.note: Students from all colleges must register for course by completing an Independent Study Form on-line at http://biology.cornell.edu/forms-and-docs.

Prerequisite: previous enrollment in course to be taught or equivalent. Arts students may not count this course toward graduation but may, upon petition (one time only) to their class dean, carry fewer than 12 other credits and remain in good standing. This would affect Dean's List eligibility but not eligibility for graduating with distinction. Students from all Colleges must submit a CALS Special Studies Form (Available online: http://cals.cornell.edu/academics/registrar/policies/#independent-study). Do not sign into section 601. You will be put in the course after submitting form online.

course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Biology Study Group Leader Training and Teaching Experience

notes.note: Study group leaders must have taken and demonstrated excellence in the associated biology course. Email Allen MacNeill (adm6@cornell.edu) for enrollment information.

course.subject: BIOG
course.course_title: Biology Senior Study Group Leader Training and Teaching Experience

notes.note: Senior study group leaders must have served at least one semester as a study group leader for the associated biology course. Email Allen MacNeill (adm6@cornell.edu) for enrollment information.
Students from all colleges must register for course by completing an Independent Study Form on-line at http://biology.cornell.edu/forms-and-docs.
